ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Everquest: Lost Dungeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know, you don t need to have anything but the original EverQuest game in order to make another expansion work. Sure having Ykesha might help, but I
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know, you don't need to have anything but the original EverQuest
game in order to make another expansion work. Sure having Ykesha might help,
but I don't know if it's required. That is something I will have to look
into.
(I would have replied sooner but for some reason my account started bouncing
emails and yahoo wouldn't let me send stuff)
luv,
-Su

> I am seriously thinking about getting this. I agree on the opening
> and bashing of chests and things. Other games I've played, it's kinda
> fun finding new treasures in chests and when I find a chest in EQ I
> want to bash it then remember I can't LOL.
>
> I think that the private space will be cool! My help some of the
> lower-level players (such as myself) level a little faster without
> getting accused of Ks'ing :)
>
> The EQ site mentioned LoY Broken Skull was the starting point of this
> new expansion. Does anyone know if I need to purchase LoY first
> before I can buy the new expansion?
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> > So, another expansion pack is coming out. The features listed look
> pretty
> > cool.
> > I'll be interested to see how they are implemented and how they
> work in the
> > game.
> > Anyone else looked at the webpage and have any thoughts on this?
> > I love the idea of being able to unlock, open, or bash open chests
> and such.
> > That is something I feel was missing from this game. And the
> private space
> > sounds good too.
> > Thoughts?
> > luv,
> > -Su
>
>
